/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, paints a vibrant picture of urban development. A concrete overpass arches over the street, adding a touch of modern architecture to the scene. Graffiti adorns the walls of the overpass, hinting at the city's vibrant street art culture. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
